---
name: User Story
about: A template for creating user stories.
title: Describe This In Five~ish words
labels: B-Review
assignees: ''

---

# Request
As a ___,
I want to ___,
so that ___.

# Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] The tasks that
- [ ] need to be completed
- [ ] for this user story
- [ ] to be completed.

# Dependencies
Any other #issues that this issue requires and why.
